attributes.action: Make the London mayoral election a national election.
attributes.additional_details: Every citizen should have the chance to decide the leader of our Capitol city, London exerts great influence over the rest of the United Kingdom and a certain amount of influence should be tipped into the favour of the vaste majority who have no say in what direction their Capitol is traversing too. London isn't just for Lonodoners, it is the leading eminence for all those who call this great country home.
attributes.background: Make the London mayoral election a national election, like a general election but for the leader of our Capitol city.
